backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing user profiles, payout methods, and withdrawal requests with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend source files.
frontend/BUILD_DEPLOY_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide covering build, deploy steps, environment variables, and troubleshooting for frontend and canisters.
frontend/docs/betting-topup-video-checkl: Checklist documenting required UI elements and interactions for the betting top-up flow.
frontend/docs/crypto-wallet-dashboard-ch: Checklist of required UI components and states for the crypto wallet dashboard implementation.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS file defining design tokens, color variables, and dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the frontend root element and main application script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the app’s root layout, authentication gate, profile-setup modal logic, and all TanStack Router routes for pages including dashboard, KYC, gift cards, withdrawals, and services.
frontend/src/backend-augment.d.ts: Extends the generated backend actor interface to include the admin initialization method _initializeAccessControlWithSecret.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Checks if the caller is an admin and either renders protected children, a loading skeleton, or an access-denied message.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginCard.t: Displays the login UI using Internet Identity with a branded card, loading state, and informational alerts.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoAct: Renders a single crypto transaction row with icons, status badge, formatted timestamp, and amount display.
Loads and filters local crypto transactions, updating in real time and displaying them with tabs and skeleton states.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoDas: Shows a styled crypto balance header with background visuals and a toggle to hide or show the balance.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoQui: Renders a horizontal list of crypto action buttons such as send, receive, buy, swap, and send to bank.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoTok: Lists crypto tokens with icons, balances, and values, allowing optional click handling for each asset.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Bu: UI sheet for selecting a crypto asset and USD amount to buy, creating a pending local transaction after validation.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Re: UI sheet for selecting a crypto asset and copying a mock receive address, logging a placeholder received transaction.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Se: UI sheet for sending crypto by selecting an asset, entering an address and amount, and creating a pending sent transaction.
Multi‑step UI flow for withdrawing funds to a bank account, including payout method selection and submission of withdrawal requests.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Sw: UI sheet for swapping between two crypto assets with mock rate calculation and logging a swap transaction.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Promo card displaying a global connectivity message with an illustration and pagination dots.
Configurable dashboard shortcut tile with icon, label, optional badge, and disabled state for coming-soon items.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/GiftCa: Displays a clickable gift card brand row with an icon and name, falling back to a generic icon on load errors.
Renders a small set of label badges with an optional counter for remaining tags.
Provides UI to add, remove, and save editable gift card labels with change detection and save handling.
Allows filtering by available labels through a popover with searchable tags and displays selected filters.
Shows a card listing NGN rate tiers for a gift card brand using formatted amounts and rates.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/NGNRat: Displays a brief NGN rate summary for a matched tier or an unavailable notice when applicable.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/Select: Bottom sheet selector for browsing and searching gift card brands and choosing one.
frontend/src/components/history/HistoryT: Renders a transaction row with icon, timestamp, amount, and status styling based on transaction properties.
Layout wrapper providing desktop sidebar, mobile header, navigation, and logout handling for the app.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileBot: Provides a mobile bottom navigation bar with icons and route navigation highlighting.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal for creating a user profile with name input and async profile creation handling.
frontend/src/components/services/BillCat: Clickable card component showing a bill category icon and label with keyboard support.
frontend/src/config/betting.ts: Defines betting providers list and preset amount chip values.
frontend/src/config/finance.ts: Provides conversion rate config and a function to calculate gross, fee, and net values.
frontend/src/config/giftCardBrandCatalog: Catalog of gift card brands with icons and search terms plus a filter helper.
frontend/src/config/giftCardRatesNGN.ts: Defines NGN gift card rate tiers, brand overrides, and helpers for tier matching and formatting.
frontend/src/config/vendors.ts: Vendor rate configurations and logic to select the best vendor by net payout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Re-exports hook for fetching the caller's user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardData.ts: Aggregates user profile, KYC, cards, withdrawals, and transactions into dashboard-ready data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotificationPermis: Provides a hook to check browser notification support, track permission state, and request permission safely.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotificationSettin: Manages per‑principal notification preferences with localStorage persistence and toggle support.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileSetupSuppre: Tracks and updates whether a user has dismissed profile setup using localStorage per principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend interactions with React Query for user profiles and gift cards, including mapping backend types.
frontend/src/hooks/useWalletSummary.ts: Extracts wallet balance and currency from the caller's user profile.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides class name merging plus helpers for currency formatting and date formatting.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminKycReviewP: Admin tool to look up a user by principal, view their KYC records, and update each record’s status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWithdrawal: Admin interface for viewing pending withdrawal requests and approving or rejecting them.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the dashboard with balance display and shortcut tiles, using dashboard data and formatting utilities.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/__tests__/a: Empty test file placeholder for NGN rate summary behavior.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/addGiftCard: Computes the matching NGN rate tier for a brand and amount by parsing input and selecting the correct tier.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/AddGiftCard: Form for adding a new gift card with brand, currency, amount, code, optional image upload, and NGN rate preview.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/GiftCardDet: Displays detailed info for a gift card, including status, tags, and NGN rate table, with controls to update status and labels.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/GiftCardsLi: Shows a filterable list of all gift cards using label-based filtering and links to add or view cards.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/HottestCard: Ranks and displays gift cards by their best NGN rates and provides navigation to add or view cards.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/hottestCard: Provides logic to compute best NGN rates per brand and rank gift cards deterministically by rate and metadata.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/SellGiftCar: Allows selling a gift card by entering an amount, selecting a vendor, and viewing conversion details based on NGN rates.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays locally stored transactions and updates the view when new transactions are added.
frontend/src/pages/KycPage.tsx: User KYC page allowing document upload, status viewing, and submission with file-size checks and upload progress tracking.
Form page for purchasing airtime, capturing provider, phone, and amount, and logging the transaction locally.
Betting top-up form with provider selection, account ID, amount entry, and a review step before logging a pending local transaction.
frontend/src/pages/services/BillsPage.ts: Bills category selection page showing tiles that navigate to various service payment pages.
frontend/src/pages/services/CableTvBills: Placeholder cable TV bill payment form that logs a pending transaction after submitting smartcard number and amount.
frontend/src/pages/services/CryptoWallet: Crypto wallet dashboard showing balances, token list, activity, and sheets for send, receive, buy, swap, and bank transfer actions using mock data.
frontend/src/pages/services/DataPage.tsx: Placeholder mobile data purchase form that logs a pending transaction using phone number and amount.
frontend/src/pages/services/ElectricityP: Placeholder electricity bill payment form that logs a pending transaction with meter number and amount.
frontend/src/pages/services/WifiInternet: React page for logging placeholder WiFi/Internet bill payments and storing them as local transactions.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page displaying Internet Identity info and allowing users to enable or disable browser notifications.
frontend/src/pages/withdrawals/Withdrawa: UI for managing withdrawals, listing past requests, adding payout methods, and submitting new withdrawal requests.
frontend/src/state/localTransactions.ts: Manages local transaction storage in localStorage with add, get, and clear helpers.
frontend/src/state/notificationSettingsS: Handles per-principal notification settings using scoped localStorage keys.
frontend/src/types/app-types.ts: Defines app-wide TypeScript types for users, wallets, transactions, gift cards, KYC, payouts, and withdrawals.
frontend/src/types/process-env.d.ts: Declares TypeScript types for environment variables injected by Vite.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugin setup.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration for React, environment variables, aliases, build settings, proxies, and dependency optimization.
project_state.json: Tracks project configuration, existing features, and pending requests related to replacing Firebase with Internet Identity and Motoko-based data persistence. Includes metadata about versions, architectural notes, and planned backend work.
